Metadata.Title: bad body gaurds
Metadata.Description: Contract ID: 7392-BC5Client: AnonymousTarget: Five BodyguardsLocation: Hawsbay, NEW ZEALANDDetails:We have a unique opportunity for an experienced professional to neutralize a group of five highly trained bodyguards, who are currently providing security for a high-profile individual. These guards have proven to be an impenetrable barrier to our client's objectives and must be eliminated fast.
